docs.abstract: NHL Roundup; John Scott, winger for American Hockey League affiliate of Montreal Canadiens, says someone with NHL called to discourage him from accepting spot in All-Star Game; other hockey news noted.

docs.snippet: Of the visitors expected to pour into Brazil in August, some may get infected by the mosquito-borne virus and then return home at a time of peak mosquito activity....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of the visitors expected to pour into Brazil in August, some may get infected by the mosquito-borne virus and then return home at a time of peak mosquito activity.
docs.abstract: Hundreds of thousands plan to attend 2016 Olympic games in Brazil, where outbreak of Zika virus has alarmed health officials; authorities fear travelers to games will bring virus, which has been linked to surge in birth defects, back to their home countries.

headline.main: Researchers Weigh Risks of Zika Spreading at Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: Experts Weigh the Risks of Zika Spreading Via Rio Olympics

byline.contributor: Simon Romero reported from Rio de Janeiro, and Rebecca R. Ruiz from New York.
byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and REBECCA R. RUIZ

docs.snippet: Set back from the white sand beach which first attracted tourists to Magaluf in the 1960s, a smart new development is rising - part of the Mallorcan resort's plan to transform itself from an alchohol-fueled fleshpot awash with young Britons to a h...
docs.lead_paragraph: Set back from the white sand beach which first attracted tourists to Magaluf in the 1960s, a smart new development is rising - part of the Mallorcan resort's plan to transform itself from an alchohol-fueled fleshpot awash with young Britons to a high-end holiday destination for families and couples.
